quote: Divorce is a process, not an event. It takes months to unfold, a barrage of emotional ups and downs as denial is replaced by grief, grief by anger, and anger gradually eases into acceptance.
quote_letters: DIVORCE IS A PROCESS NOT AN EVENT IT TAKES MONTHS TO UNFOLD A BARRAGE OF EMOTIONAL UPS AND DOWNS AS DENIAL IS REPLACED BY GRIEF GRIEF BY ANGER AND ANGER GRADUALLY EASES INTO ACCEPTANCE
source: M. K. Tod, Time and Regret
